DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect muscle fatigue scapular kinematics overhead athlete without use kinesio tap technique facilitate low trapezius function . The hypothesis tap technique could compensate negative effect cause muscle fatigue scapular kinematics healthy overhead athlete .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Muscle Fatigue Taping Technique Shoulder Motion Athletes
DOC.detailed_description: Muscle fatigue potential cause shoulder injury overhead athlete . Considering important role lower trapezius functional scapular stability , suggest kinesio tap technique facilitate function could compensate negative effect muscle fatigue scapular kinematics . This randomize crossover study include athlete evaluate three session , period seven day : Control ( fatigue protocol , without tap ) , Kinesio Taping ( fatigue protocol elastic tap applied tension ) Sham ( fatigue protocol tap apply without tension ) . During session , tridimensional kinematics scapula humerus electromyography serratus anterior trapezius ( upper low portion ) muscle dominant shoulder evaluate , scaption throw movement , immediately immediately fatigue protocol.The change scapular movement ( versus fatigue protocol ) compare among session .
DOC.criteria: Overhead athlete regularly train ; No report shoulder pain last 6 month . Exclusion criterion : Previous shoulder neck surgery ; Previous shoulder dislocation .
